moves.name: Scratch
moves.description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Pursuit
moves.description: An attack move that inflicts double damage if used on a target that is switching out of battle.

moves.name: Fake Tears
moves.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Foul Play
moves.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage.

moves.name: Torment
moves.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Punishment
moves.description: This attack's power increases the more the target has powered up with stat changes.

moves.name: Nasty Plot
moves.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Imprison
moves.description: If the opponents know any move also known by the user, the opponents are prevented from using it.

moves.name: Night Daze
moves.description: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. It may also lower the target's accuracy.
